author: Rohit Samanta
title: Meghalaya Arunachal trip in September 2015
text: # 1 Hello everyone. I am planning a trip to Arunachal + Meghalaya in September 2015. I'm sharing the itinerary. Please advise me on whether this is a feasible plan for 3 people(including a n 11year old). 19th Oct Arrival at Guwahati at 1900 hrs. Day 0: Overnight stay at Guwahati. Day 1: Guwahati -> Bhalukpong -> Bomdila [overnight at Bomdila] Day 2: Bomdila -> Tawang(via Sela Top) (orchidarium visit, Mongpa village en route) [overnight at Tawang] Day 3: Tawang(Sela Pass, madhuri Lake) [overnight at Tawang] Day 4: Tawang(monastery visit) -> Dirang (local sightseeing) [overnight at Dirang] Day 5: Dirang -> Guwahati [overnight at Guwahati] Day 6: Guwahati -> Shillong -> Mawphlang(David Scott Trek-tentative) -> Shillong [overnight at Shillong] Day 7: Shillong -> Sohra [overnight at Sohra] Day 8: Sohra -> Mawsynram() -> Sohra [overnight at Sohra] Day 9: Sohra -> Mawlynnong(living root bridge) [overnight at Sohra] Day 10: Back to Guwahati for flight back to Kol at 1935 hrs (29th Oct). If possible, itinerary can include these Additional places to visit: #(1 day): Dawki-Amlarem-Jarain-Thadlaskein + (1 day): Nartiang-Larnai-Tyrshi falls
